response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a game-changer that can significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Given its unparalleled features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $1,000,000. We are offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is your chance to secure a high-quality asset at a premium discount. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or arranging a viewing.", "product_price": 950000}
